summary: The customer service representative (speaker_0) from a P2P lending platform is calling a customer (speaker_1) who has invested on their platform for the first time. The representative is inquiring about the customer's experience and offering assistance with any doubts or queries the customer might have.
customer_concerns: - The customer has some doubts about lump sum investments, but is not looking into it at the moment.
questions_asked: - The customer did not ask any specific questions.
overall_sentiment:
Neutral.
The conversation is polite and the customer service representative is trying to be helpful, but there is no indication of any strong positive or negative sentiment from the customer.
